sentiment_articles.title: Eli Lilly stock sell-off was 'overreaction': Analysts
sentiment_articles.summary: Eli Lilly's stock suffered a nearly 12% loss in markets Thursday despite strong earnings, in what analysts say is an overreaction to GLP-1 news.
